revised_title: Ionization Cross-Section of O by Electron Impact
tldr: The article presents a study on the ionization cross-section of oxygen (O) by electron impact. The authors describe the method of calculation, which involves the distorted wave method and the Coulomb-Born approximation. They provide tables and figures with the results of their calculations, discussing the contributions from different total angular momentum and comparing the distorted wave and Coulomb-Born methods. The study shows that the cross-section for ionization is influenced by the contribution of optical transitions and the ion charge.
